subject: CORRECTION: DFAI Migration Access Instructions for You and Bae

content.summary: Corrected access instructions for DFAI migration - use existing repo
content.details: Lloyd, I need to correct my previous message. The AIPO and SHC components are already in the current repository structure at `/core/ai-core-components/aipo/`. There's no need to clone a separate repository. The migration checklist I created (KRA-20250427-BaeLloydDFAIMigrationChecklist.md) is valid, but you should use the existing components in the current repository rather than trying to clone a new one. Please share this correction with Bae as well.
action_items: Use the existing AIPO components at `/core/ai-core-components/aipo/`
Create a new project directory and copy the necessary components from the current repository
Respond to this message with any questions or concerns
